title: Immortal Betrayal
description: Imagine the history you would see if you lived for 600 years. Dano Varos doesn’t have to imagine. Born in 1420, Dano tells of some of his adventures from centuries past. Spanning from 15th century Normandy to 20th century St. Petersburg, his story includes his role in saving the Russian Imperial Crown from the ambitions of a shadowy character from his youth … twice. This is the thrilling first story from the chronicles of the Mages.
author: Daniel A. Willis
